subject: Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Darren Chiacchia nearly died after his horse crashed in the equestrian sport of eventing. Now, less than a year later, Chiacchia is competing again.
snippet: Darren Chiacchia nearly died after his horse crashed in the equestrian sport of eventing. Now, less than a year later, Chiacchia is competing again.
